가사:
Night train coming on my way
Foot together trying to fit in
Every every becoming someone
seem so tired from the day
Close my eyes and suddenly
a few things came up
and I erase the rest
until there's only one scenery left
Every every details already know
where to find their own seats
The house in my dream
has done building
On a table
you'll see the small plates
and the kids playing around
And you'd promise me
to pick some flowers
For me you said oh for me
How are you and all your wishes
I'd hope to be there
when everyone celebrates
And it is nothing but my letters
that will be someday sent to you
The lights in our time
has gone away
But still we hold the candles
to know we're fine
And I'd have to tell you
how much I love you
So you won't forget
before we wake up
So you won't be lonely
before we wake up
Night train coming on my way
Foot together trying to fit in
Every every every
becoming someone
could all be happy in
all these sweet dreams
